TopicTitle: If I make an AlienFX plugin will anyone want it?

Articles.Content:
there should be a "have" between "you" and "alienfx" in the poll but I can't edit it EDIT: Fixed -Navy4422

If I make an AlienFX plugin to hook the lighting up to some game events and variables (SAS/RCS status over the relevant keys + throttle and maybe stagelock) will anyone want it?

For those that haven't heard of it AlienFX is a dynamic multicoloured lighting system fitted to all Alienware Computers.

Edited December 17, 2013 by Navy4422
Changed poll

I would really like an AlienFX plugin for KSP. I just got my Alienware laptop today, and I can already see potential in a plugin like this. By the way, I see that this thread has not been updated since April, how is the project going?
I'm game. I like this idea, normally I dont use AlienFX but I would for this!
For a moment, I thought you where going to put alien-aliens (not Kerbals) in the game. I would *really* love that

Count me in.

I cant stand alienfx on fast pace competetive games but i think it would be fun in ksp

I don't have an overpriced computer, so no.

EDIT: Also this is a necro, should be locked shouldn't it?
